entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Kananaskis (Nakiska Ridgetop)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending after midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Fog patches developing near midnight. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Flurries beginning late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 25 March 2023
